data.text: With the gremlins defeated, the airport security forces quickly lose interest in you, having ostensibly proven that you are a rule-abiding citizen.
The bots and agents disperse, but one of them leaves behind a strange metal card dotted with perforations. It almost reminds you of an ancient punch card, though made of sturdier stuff.
You're not really sure what to do with it, so for now you just store it away. Maybe you can find a computer to put it in later.
